name: DMEasy™ Multi-Purpose HighTack Spray Adhesive
description: DMEasy™ Multi-Purpose HighTack Spray Adhesive is formulated to be a multi-purpose industrial strength adhesive for construction related applications. Industries for which this adhesive is suitable include general construction, furniture, RV, upholstery and many others. Materials that WT-DMEasy™ will effectively bond include bead board, particle board, plywood, polyurethane foam, fabrics, insulation for holding tanks, insulation panel construction and many others. Westech DMEasy product is formulated as a non-methylene chloride, solvent-based, multi-purpose adhesive for industrial use.
